name: Classifies Coherence Systems
description: Categorizes the various types of dynamical systems that naturally preserve or enhance coherence through evolution.
subject: urn:uor:resource:coherence-preserving-dynamics
contextualDescription: The Coherence-Preserving Dynamics resource classifies several important types of dynamical systems that naturally preserve or enhance coherence, including gradient systems, Hamiltonian systems with coherence constraints, adaptive optimization systems, and stochastic coherence-preserving dynamics.
